general.welcome_message: Hi, I'm Bean! Type %1$shelp to get started!
general.no_perms: You don't have permission to do this!
general.no_bot_perms1: I don't have the required permission to do this!
general.db_error: We currently have an issue with our database. Please try again later!

commands.dj_privileges_info: **Note:** To get DJ privileges, you either need to have a role called "DJ", have Manage Channel permissions or be alone in the channel with the bot
commands.cannot_run_in_dm: %1$s This command cannot be run in DMs!
commands.disabled_or_unknown: This command is either no longer available or has been disabled
commands.user_not_in_guild: This user is not in this guild!
commands.cannot_interact_role: I cannot interact with the role %1$s!

moderator.already_added: This role is already allowed to use moderator-commands!
moderator.not_added: This role is already not allowed to use moderator-commands!
moderator.removed: %1$s is now no longer able to use moderator-commands!

case.must_be_6_digit:
The Case-ID must be 6 characters long!
Example: 4V8MNU
case.not_exists: A case with the ID "%1$s" does not exist!
case.reason_changed: Reason for case #%1$s has been changed to: %2$s!

modlog.no_modlogs: There are no modlogs for this user!

mute.duration_too_short: You cannot mute someone for this short amount of time!
mute.no_role_setup:
You have not set up a muted-role!
After you have created and/or configured your muted-role, use `%1$ssetmutedrole`

commands.set_muted_role:
%1$s is now the "muted"-role!

(Make sure to setup this role correctly, so muted users cannot communicate in chat!)
